title: 04/12/2021 - Hour 3 Ric Bucher
itunes:title: 04/12/2021 - Hour 3 Ric Bucher
description:
Jason Smith and Doug Gottlieb explain why The Masters didn’t have the same draw it usually does this year, NBA insider Ric Bucher joins the show for all the latest out of the NBA, and the guys look at some recent reports coming out of the Philadelphia Eagles locker room that doesn’t paint a pretty picture!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
